name: Pachinko Machine Maker
description:
Instructions

Use the Pachinko Machine Maker to make an enjoyable and, more importantly, profitable game machine.

  • Select a tool to place parts in the center canvas.
  • Right Click to remove part.
  • Hover over a stat to learn more.
  • Press START to test your machine!

Leave your top score in the comments :)

This game was made for Trijam #135 in 4 hours.

All assets made by me during the jam.
